title: It's Just Best To Move On? | Guest: Andy McCarthy | 4/19/19
description:
Hour 1 
Has Glenn Beck has been indited? ...The Mueller Report, the day after? Denial is addicting? Does the report really change any body's mind? The people around Trump saved his day? "For those at home Scoring the Mueller Report?"
 
Hour 2
Puppy Clubbing parties? "I don't think President Trump has seen Rocky 4 or knows about Ivan Drago?" Trumps Economy is Booming and 51% of America think so too? ...Top Blaze Researcher and Mueller report reader, Jason Buttrill joins to pile on some more the play-by-play? ...Happy Easter from Glenn Beck 
 
Hour 3
The Redacted Mueller Report with Andy McCarthy. No obstruction but it's not wise for President Trump to brag about it, 'it's best to move on'? There we're Dark conspiracies against the President from the get go? The 3 Essential Elements of the Crime that Need Clearing?

content:encoded:
Hour 1  Has Glenn Beck has been indited? ...The Mueller Report, the day after? Denial is addicting? Does the report really change any body's mind? The people around Trump saved his day? "For those at home Scoring the Mueller Report?"   Hour 2 Puppy Clubbing parties? "I don't think President Trump has seen Rocky 4 or knows about Ivan Drago?" Trumps Economy is Booming and 51% of America think so too? ...Top Blaze Researcher and Mueller report reader, Jason Buttrill joins to pile on some more the play-by-play? ...Happy Easter from Glenn Beck    Hour 3 The Redacted Mueller Report with Andy McCarthy. No obstruction but it's not wise for President Trump to brag about it, 'it's best to move on'? There we're Dark conspiracies against the President from the get go? The 3 Essential Elements of the Crime that Need Clearing?
